articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Mirim Riding Club
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Mirim Riding Club
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Mirim Riding Club built as a monumental edifice in the WPK era. 
					He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history. 
					
					He said a portrait of leader Kim Jong Il, photos of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and other historical relics are displayed well in the room. 
					
					Going round the riding service center, indoor riding training hall, room for distribution of riding knowledge, etc. of the club, he learnt in detail about the construction. 
					
					He said that every facility of the club fully reflected the WPK's idea of the architectural aesthetics for designing it to suit its character and service and that all the facilities have been built to reach the standard desired by the party. 
					
					He said that the club is in harmony with nature as the outer walls of the buildings were plastered with logs and seats of open-air stands and resting tents, riding blocks and signposts were also made with wood. 
					
					He was satisfied to see the turf, earth-sand courses, car roads and footways made in quality, the man-made hill, waterfall and pool built in a particular way to ensure natural beauty and the vicinity decorated by trees of good species and turf. 
					
					Pleased to see 60-odd horses sent by the party and young people enjoying horse riding, he said that when the club is opened, it will be visited by many people as horse riding is available for all seasons.
					
					He highly praised the soldier-builders for successfully completing the construction of the club in a short span of time.
					
					He said the construction of the club proved again that nothing is impossible to do as there are the wise leadership of the party and the people's army, which unconditionally and devotedly carries out anything the supreme commander is determined to do.
					
					He extended thanks as supreme commander of the KPA to all the soldier-builders.
					
					Noting public service facilities including the Mirim Riding Club, Munsu Water Park, Ryukyong Dental Hospital and Okryu Children's Hospital have been built this year, he said it is the determination of the party to build more such public facilities in the future.
					
					He gave an instruction to hold the opening ceremony of the club at an early date so that people including youth and children may benefit from it as early as possible.
					
					He was accompanied by KPA Vice-Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Ma Won Chun, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the New Socialist Party of Japan headed by Eiko Tomiyama, vice-president of its Central Executive Committee, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					The guests paid tribute to the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made undying contributions to defending world peace and stability.
					
					They entered the halls where the great Generalissimos lie in state and made a bow to them.
					
					They went round halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display, mourning hall and halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Congolese Government Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Congolese Government Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Congolese government delegation headed by Gakosso Jean Claude, minister of Culture and Art, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					The guests went round the historical relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the undying revolutionary life of the President and his patriotic and revolutionary family in Mangyongdae.
					
					Then they visited the revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					At the end of the visit, the head of the delegation said:
					
					Kim Il Sung was born to a simple family and embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years.
					
					He founded the great Juche idea and indicated the way to be followed by mankind.
					
					I read his many works. The Juche idea is being widely studied and disseminated in Congo and other African countries.
					
					The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, International Friendship Exhibition House, Mansudae Art Studio, etc. and enjoyed a performance given by the art group of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: Russian Orchestra Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Orchestra Leaves
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia led by Pavel Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the orchestra, left here for home on Sunday.

articles.title: Participants in KPA Meeting Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in KPA Meeting Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th meeting of company commanders and political instructors of the Korean People's Army Sunday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					They laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, and paid tribute.
					
					Then they went round historical relics preserved with much care in his thatch-roofed house in Mangyongdae.
					
					They also visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					They laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and made a bow.
					
					They also laid bouquets on the wreath-laying stand of the cemetery and observed a moment's silence in memory of the revolutionary martyrs.
					
					They went to the Rungna People's Pleasure Park.
					
					At the Rungna Dolphinarium they visited the water tank for performance, auxiliary tank, room for disseminating scientific and technological knowledge and welfare service facilities. They were delighted at dolphins displaying various tricks to the tune of cheerful music.
					
					They also enjoyed themselves at the Rungna Funfair.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Arch Criminals Wrecking Peace
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Arch Criminals Wrecking Peace
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. nuclear carrier called a "floating military base" is sailing in the West Sea of Korea after being involved in the war maneuvers in the East and South Seas of Korea, an indication that the U.S. is intent to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost, says Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary.
					The U.S describes the drills of the nuclear carrier flotilla as "regular ones for rescue", sophism for misleading the public opinion, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					The U.S. war hysteria on the peninsula where a touch-and-go situation is prevailing is little short of declaring a war against the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. misses no opportunity to claim it has no hostile policy toward the DPRK but it is a lie. The U.S. is intent to deliberately aggravate the situation on the peninsula, concentrate more forces for aggression in Northeast Asia under this pretext, have military hegemony and, at the same time, realize the ambition for world supremacy. Peace touted by it is a reversed signboard for war.
					
					We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the south Korean puppet group engrossed in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen is following the U.S. moves for igniting a war against the DPRK.
					
					It is the group which chilled the atmosphere of dialogue created by the DPRK's sincere efforts. The puppet forces are keen on escalating confrontation and igniting a war as they solicit foreign forces for cooperation being hell-bent on realizing the ambition for invading the DPRK while provoking the fellow countrymen exploring the way for dialogue and cooperation.
					
					All facts fully prove that the U.S. and the puppet group are the arch criminals wrecking peace.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Regime's Call for "Peaceful Cooperation" Hypocritical
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Regime's Call for "Peaceful Cooperation" Hypocritical
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Now the south Korean puppet forces act conceitedly as if they achieved great "success", claiming that the "plan for peaceful cooperation in Northeast Asia" and "settlement of security dialogue" which were actively advocated by Park Geun Hye during her visit to Southeast Asia garnered "support" from different countries.
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a commentary which continues:
					
					The south Korean puppet forces try to boost their images with self-laudation and cover their confrontation scheme but such childish method will never work.
					
					The so-called "plan for peaceful cooperation in Northeast Asia" and "security dialogue" serve as a frame of the international confrontation with the DPRK to isolate and stifle the fellow countrymen through cooperation with foreign forces including the U.S.
					
					The puppet group together with the U.S. stamped its seal on the "tailored deterrence strategy", a scenario for preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, talking about someone's "provocation" and "threat".
					
					The tightened "alliance" with the U.S. that was pursued by the successive south Korean ruling forces has never been of any contribution to relaxing tension and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula and improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					The "alliance" between the U.S. and south Korea for a war against the DPRK has reached the most dangerous phase in history by the warlike moves of the present puppet ruling forces that are accustomed to sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					The south Korean authorities' call for "peaceful cooperation" is, in essence, a slogan for breaking peace and provoking a war against the north.
					
					The south Korean regime should stop the useless wordplay deceiving the public opinion at home and abroad and the moves for strengthening the "alliance" with the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S.-Japan Military Nexus
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S.-Japan Military Nexus
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-Japan tie-ups are being carried to the dangerous stage with an aim at an invasion of Northeast Asia and the military supremacy.
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article:
					
					Not long ago, the U.S.-Japan security consultative committee held a meeting in Tokyo and adopted a joint statement.
					
					The statement, a joint product of the U.S. and Japanese authorities in charge of foreign and military affairs, expressed Washington's open support for Japan's plan for bolstering military forces including the exercise of the right to collective self-defence.
					
					The statement prompted the expansion of the scope of the military operation through U.S.-Japan military alliance and elevated its function to be more offensive.
					
					It reflects the common interests of the U.S. and Japan and their respective ambitions.
					
					The past U.S.-Japan military alliance was restricted to some extent in their joint military operation as Japan was banned from exercising the right to collective self-defence.
					
					Now that Japan has got the permission from the U.S. for the legitimate exercise of the right, it is self-evident that Tokyo will play the role of an attacker in the future joint military operation.
					
					Through the statement the U.S. provided Japan with the condition for provoking the 2nd Korean war by "Self-Defence Forces" in alignment with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					
					Japan's invasion of the DPRK is becoming a reality.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are closely watching the U.S. and Japan in their military moves for aggression.
					
					The more the U.S. and Japan get hell-bent on tightening military nexus, the more the army and people of the DPRK will boost efforts for ensuring peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Authorities Accused of Interfering in Election
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Accused of Interfering in Election
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on Thursday carried an editorial titled "Growing suspicion over Defense Ministry's organized interference in election".
					Evidence has been disclosed one after another proving that agents of the Cyber Command belonging to the puppet Defense Ministry interfered in the past "presidential election" in an organized way, the editorial said.
					
					This is another shocking case in the wake of that of the Intelligence Service's interference in the election, it noted.
					
					The Cyber Command was involved in the case though it was formed under the pretext of providing against someone's cyber attack, something more serious than the IS's interference in politics, it charged. It went on:
					
					The Cyber Command received money from the IS and the two institutions built public opinion for the election at the same time. This casts big doubt as to the formation of mutual ties for the interference in the election.
					
					When the fact was exposed, the military authorities ordered the investigation into the truth about the case, but there are a lot of doubts as to their ability to fully probe the truth.
					
					If the military authorities do not probe the truth about the case, it is necessary to thoroughly probe the truth through state investigation and call them to account for it.

articles.title: Land Pollution by S. Korean Puppet Army Units Exposed
articles.content:
Land Pollution by S. Korean Puppet Army Units Exposed
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- An article about serious land pollution by units of the south Korean puppet army was posted on a south Korean internet paper on October 16.
					According to the available data, the 2010-2012 survey of the land where army units and military bases stationed showed that more than 40 places were seriously polluted by carcinogen causing leukemia, skin diseases, etc.
					
					Poisonous material exceeded the tolerance value 20 times at a unit of the 27th Division of the puppet army and ten times at a unit of the 12th Division of the army.
					
					Carcinogen detected in the land around the firing range of the puppet army far exceeded the tolerance limit.
					
					This fact is sparking off serious concerns in south Korean society.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Websites of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Websites of Swiss Organization
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully" of President Kim Il Sung's work "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee" was posted on the websites of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on October 10.
					This part of the work, made public on October 10, Juche 69 (1980), deals with the efforts the Workers' Party of Korea has made for national reunification in the period under review, and indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					It also clarifies the new reunification proposal on establishing the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) in line with the three principles of national reunification and the 10-point policy to be pursued by the DFRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Russian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Russian Personages
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work was brought out in a booklet with due ceremony in the office of the Russian paper Patriot on Oct. 10.
					Demskov, editor-in-chief of the paper, and other speakers said at the ceremony that a picture of Kim Jong Un was printed on the booklet as wished by all the readers.
					
					They said that the august image of Kim Jong Un instills conviction in victory and hope into the minds of the Russian patriots.
					
					They noted that the DPRK, which displays Kim Jong Il's patriotism, is dynamically advancing along the road to socialism despite all vicious moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces to stifle it, while demonstrating its might as a nuclear weapons state and a satellite-manufacturing and launching state, which no one dares provoke.
					
					They said that Kim Jong Un is devoting his all to turning the DPRK into the most powerful and prosperous country in the world.
					
					The DPRK is becoming a model for progressive mankind struggling for independence, they added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Syrian, Pakistani Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Syrian, Pakistani Figures
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Syrian and Pakistani figures issued statements on Oct. 9 and 10 to mark the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Saber Ballul, head of the Department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus of Syria, said:
					
					Oct. 10, the anniversary of the WPK, is an auspicious day progressive mankind is greeting together with the Korean people.
					
					The WPK is an invincible and iron-willed party which has successfully led the people's struggle for the prosperity of the country since it was founded.
					
					The WPK has reliably defended socialism by dint of Songun.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il developed the party into the mother party enjoying the absolute support and trust of the people, and he was the tender-hearted father of the Korean people who provided the rosy future for building a thriving nation.
					
					The feats President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in carrying out the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will always be remembered by progressive mankind.
					
					Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, is a distinguished leader in the present times who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					Berkat Ullah, chairman of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that only victory and glory are in store for the WPK and the Korean people advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was published in booklet by the Russian newspaper Patriot.
					The work, made public on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his whole life characterized by his warm love for the country and its people.
					
					It also clarifies important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					The booklet carried a photo of Kim Jong Un waving back to the cheering masses in the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					A book releasing ceremony took place at the newspaper office on October 10.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- Lectures, film shows and book and photo exhibitions took place in Thailand, Vietnam and Brazil on Oct. 7 to mark the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Displayed in the venues of the events were photos documenting the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also on display were their works and books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					Films shown included Korean film "Pyongyang Today".
					
					Figures and people of those countries were present at the events.
					
					The chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand in a lecture said that Kim Il Sung closely rallied not only workers, peasants but also intellectuals around the party, unaffected by the preceding theory.
					
					He said that the DPRK is throwing its rays in the world thanks to the Juche idea founded by Kim Il Sung and the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					He noted that supreme leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Un is strengthening the might of the WPK and wisely leading the work for building a thriving nation, true to the cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					The president of a company of Vietnam said that the film offered him an opportunity to know better about Pyongyang that turned into a beautiful city under the wise leadership of the WPK.
					
					The principal of a college in Brasilia City of Brazil praised the undying feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in party-building and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Indian Personage Urges S. Korean Authorities to Implement October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
Indian Personage Urges S. Korean Authorities to Implement October 4 Declaration
Pyongyang, October 20 (KCNA) -- The Indian Society for Juche Idea-Self-Reliance Studies held a lecture on October 4, the 6th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					Displayed at its venue were photos documenting the undying exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Parveen Gupta, secretary general of the society, noted in his lecture titled "For independent reunification, peace and prosperity":
					
					"Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" was adopted in Pyongyang on October 4, 2007.
					
					The October 4 declaration is aimed to reunify Korea independently in the spirit of "By our nation itself" clarified by the June 15 joint declaration, give utmost priority to the dignity and interests of the Korean nation and orient everything to carrying it out.
					
					So the declaration gives perfect clarification to all the issues arising in promoting the development of inter-Korean relations, ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula and meeting the common interests of the nation.
					
					It indicates an important way of defusing military tension on the peninsula, actively accelerating the development of inter-Korean relations and achieving co-prosperity of the nation as it fully reflects the aspiration of the Korean nation for settling all the issues in conformity with the desire for reconciliation, cooperation and reunification after discarding the biased viewpoint left by the era of confrontation.
					
					The south Korean authorities should sincerely implement the October 4 declaration and do away with the anachronistic confrontation idea.
